scope_description: Responsible for managing firewalls, VPN access, and intrusion detection. Handles firewall rule changes, investigates suspicious network traffic, and resolves VPN connectivity issues.
Manages all production and development databases, including Oracle and MSSQL. Handles performance tuning, backups, restores, and user access control to database schemas.
A generalist IT service desk for manual ticket triage and resolution when the specialist team is unknown.
